title: The plouumans tale compylled by syr Geffrey Chaucher knyght
author: Chaucer, Geoffrey, d. 1400, attributed name.
publisher: In Paules churche yarde at the sygne of the Hyll by Wyllyam Hyll,
notes: Not in fact by Chaucer. Also misattributed to Thomas Brampton. "A.N. Wawn, Yearbook of English studies, 2 (1972) 21-40, and BJRL, 56 (1973) 174-92, argues that the work was originally a Lollard tract written in the early 15th century, subsequently revised and gaining the addition of the prologue and lines 205-28 in the 16th century"--Halkett & Laing (3rd ed.).
Publisher's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
